name: WtWTA
summary: “Where the Wild Things Are” sends you on a raucous romp through the world of the Wild Things, as seen in the hit Warner Bros. film, directed by Spike Jonze, and based on the classic book by Maurice Sendak. Featuring an original storyline, all-new dangers and mysteries, and a truly surreal atmosphere, this game is sure to delight the Wild Thing inside adults and kids alike.
